      Subinterfaces of IPoolListener in nl.fw.yapool.sql 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IQueryCache
      A query cache that closes queries when the pool destroys connections.
      Classes in nl.fw.yapool.sql that implement IPoolListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BoundQueryCache
      A SimpleQueryCache that also limits the amount of cached queries (see BoundQueryCache.setMaxOpen(int)).
      class  SimpleQueryCache
      A simple IQueryCache that also has the option to update some QueryCacheStats.
